question_text: When selecting a power supply for a desktop build, which TWO of the following are important considerations? (Select two)
answer_options: Matching the PSU color to the case
Verifying the number of required connectors
Ensuring the PSU includes built-in Wi-Fi
Matching the refresh rate of the display
correct_answer: Verifying the number of required connectors
explanation: Power supply selection depends on meeting wattage requirements and having the right connectors for CPU, GPU, motherboard, and storage.
